gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Lakers 125, Wizards 120
gameRecap.excerpt: The Lakers hold on after a fourth quarter rush from the Wizards, and defeat Washington 125-120. Anthony Davis (35 points, 18 rebounds, three blocks) and LeBron James (25 points, seven rebounds, nine assists) led Los Angeles as Rui Hachimura added 19 points and seven rebounds. Jordan Poole led Washington with 29 points and five assists in the loss. The Lakers have now won three in a row and eight of the last ten to improve to 44-33 as the Wizards fall to 15-62.
